author: Japanbuilder
title: Finally lobbing Globs!
review:
As is the norm for these small Nexo Knights sets the Glob Lobber set delivers action in a small package for those who love this line of LEGO. 

Box/Instructions

The box shows a brave Royal Guard attacking the Glob Lobber! I hope he knows what he is doing. 

[url=https://flic.kr/p/Lj5bNF][img]https://c4.staticflickr.com/9/8550/29084211515_8e1871b56e.jpg[/img][/url][url=https://flic.kr/p/Lj5bNF]P8191756[/url] by [url=https://www.flickr.com/photos/139708441@N07/]Macster Tome[/url], on Flickr

Parts

The usual trans orange, deep black and brown pieces and red. Oh yeah and a few teeth! Though I was perplexed by having a whole plate left over when I was done. I keep fearing I missed a step in the build. 

[url=https://flic.kr/p/Lj5bPH][img]https://c8.staticflickr.com/9/8381/29084211575_535fdb27f4.jpg[/img][/url][url=https://flic.kr/p/Lj5bPH]P8191762[/url] by [url=https://www.flickr.com/photos/139708441@N07/]Macster Tome[/url], on Flickr

[url=https://flic.kr/p/Kncb1y][img]https://c1.staticflickr.com/9/8555/28463167344_9f448ec1eb.jpg[/img][/url][url=https://flic.kr/p/Kncb1y]P8191775[/url] by [url=https://www.flickr.com/photos/139708441@N07/]Macster Tome[/url], on Flickr

Minifigures

With the line less than a year old already the expectations are high on the quality of the prints used on the figures and as with their twin brethren in other sets these do the job quite nicely. 

[url=https://flic.kr/p/KncaZ1][img]https://c7.staticflickr.com/9/8230/28463167254_46113790bb.jpg[/img][/url][url=https://flic.kr/p/KncaZ1]P8191770[/url] by [url=https://www.flickr.com/photos/139708441@N07/]Macster Tome[/url], on Flickr

[url=https://flic.kr/p/Lj5bQp][img]https://c8.staticflickr.com/9/8134/29084211615_7ae8c286d3.jpg[/img][/url][url=https://flic.kr/p/Lj5bQp]P8191771[/url] by [url=https://www.flickr.com/photos/139708441@N07/]Macster Tome[/url], on Flickr

[url=https://flic.kr/p/KntJJX][img]https://c4.staticflickr.com/9/8471/28466399243_f7b7fa3c32.jpg[/img][/url][url=https://flic.kr/p/KntJJX]P8191774[/url] by [url=https://www.flickr.com/photos/139708441@N07/]Macster Tome[/url], on Flickr

The build

A rather simple build but the color scheme matches those of previous sets thus unifying all your attack sets for your Lava monsters. 

[url=https://flic.kr/p/Kncb51][img]https://c1.staticflickr.com/9/8463/28463167544_403fab7bbd.jpg[/img][/url][url=https://flic.kr/p/Kncb51]P8191777[/url] by [url=https://www.flickr.com/photos/139708441@N07/]Macster Tome[/url], on Flickr

The completed model

I feel rather sorry for this Royal Guard. With only his spear he has no chance against a fully armed Glob Lobber and its Flame Thrower operator who can also use the Glob Lobber's decorative elements as weapons! 

[url=https://flic.kr/p/Lj5bQK][img]https://c4.staticflickr.com/9/8396/29084211635_d35575bd03.jpg[/img][/url][url=https://flic.kr/p/Lj5bQK]P8191776[/url] by [url=https://www.flickr.com/photos/139708441@N07/]Macster Tome[/url], on Flickr

Overall opinion

I have been totally won over by this line. Having this little set along side the other smaller Nexo Knight sets really starts to sprout a fun diorama of armor and machines. 

If you love this line then you will likely enjoy this set for the play features, wonderful and well printed minifigures. A great addition to your Lava Army arsenal.
